position: Building Gen AI Product | Senior Associate @Publicis Sapient | IIT Kgp

experience.title: Data Science Intern
experience.description: Optimised Search and Recommendation in Product Retail Industry using Knowledge Graph• Engineered Labelled Property Graph (LPG) Database in Amazon Neptune, ingesting the modified Product Catalogue data in Amazon S3• Leveraged hierarchical relationships in the graph that reduced search space for product search using Gremlin Query Language for the graph traversal• Employed PageRank Algorithm using Gremlin to recommend similar products based on common nodes and attributes identification from the database• Built a real-time Efficient Apriori module to recommend the frequently bought together products from the graph using the customer transaction data• Dockerized, the ML Module using AWS EC2 Instance and developed dashboards and User Interface using Stremlit for visualization
experience.description_html: Optimised Search and Recommendation in Product Retail Industry using Knowledge Graph• Engineered Labelled Property Graph (LPG) Database in Amazon Neptune, ingesting the modified Product Catalogue data in Amazon S3• Leveraged hierarchical relationships in the graph that reduced search space for product search using Gremlin Query Language for the graph traversal• Employed PageRank Algorithm using Gremlin to recommend similar products based on common nodes and attributes identification from the database• Built a real-time Efficient Apriori module to recommend the frequently bought together products from the graph using the customer transaction data• Dockerized, the ML Module using AWS EC2 Instance and developed dashboards and User Interface using Stremlit for visualization

experience.title: Second Senate Member (SSM)
experience.description: • Elected by the 330+ boarders of Lala Lajpat Rai Hall of Residence to be entrusted with the responsibility of putting forward the voice of the boarders• Substantially contributed as an active member of the Students' Senate accountable for the overall welfare of 15,000+ students residing in the institute• Leading a 3 tier Hall Council of 8 General Secretaries and 30+ secretaries for the smooth functioning of hall activities and welfare of all the boarders• Accountable for drafting and managing the Annual Hall Council Budget of INR 13 Lakhs in conjunction with 330+ boarders in the hall• Strategized the successful election campaign, publicity, and student-led outreach activities for Vice President and General Secretary Social and Cultural

experience.title: Data Analyst
experience.description: Worked on Recommendation Engine model to predict customer behaviour• Engineered and transformed features to perform EDA and Data Visualization in Tableau and Plotnine to visualise trends and patterns in the dataset• Enhanced the company's Sales, Profitability, and Decision-Making by getting business insights into the dataset through trends and patterns analysis• Performed Statistical Analysis using chi-square hypothesis test and Spearman correlation to finalise the optimum features for model training• Trained LightFm Model based on Collaborative Filtering and achieved 75% Precision@5 and 67% Precision@10 in model recommendations
experience.description_html: Worked on Recommendation Engine model to predict customer behaviour• Engineered and transformed features to perform EDA and Data Visualization in Tableau and Plotnine to visualise trends and patterns in the dataset• Enhanced the company's Sales, Profitability, and Decision-Making by getting business insights into the dataset through trends and patterns analysis• Performed Statistical Analysis using chi-square hypothesis test and Spearman correlation to finalise the optimum features for model training• Trained LightFm Model based on Collaborative Filtering and achieved 75% Precision@5 and 67% Precision@10 in model recommendations

experience.title: Summer Research Intern
experience.description: Under the guidance of Prof. Anand Ramaswamy Vijaysankaran - ISB Hyderabad• Streamlined the Company news articles data across the globe from google Gdelt Project using SQL followed by data preprocessing using NLP• Carried out Sentiment Analysis on text scraped from news articles using Beautiful Soup for evaluating the news polarity score for companies• Modeling the companys news polarity score with share price fluctuation and financial metadata using various Classification models.• Performed 10 fold cross-validation to achieve an F1 score of 0.851 using SVM, 0.871 using Random Forest, and 0.826 using Naive Bayes
experience.description_html: Under the guidance of Prof. Anand Ramaswamy Vijaysankaran - ISB Hyderabad• Streamlined the Company news articles data across the globe from google Gdelt Project using SQL followed by data preprocessing using NLP• Carried out Sentiment Analysis on text scraped from news articles using Beautiful Soup for evaluating the news polarity score for companies• Modeling the companys news polarity score with share price fluctuation and financial metadata using various Classification models.• Performed 10 fold cross-validation to achieve an F1 score of 0.851 using SVM, 0.871 using Random Forest, and 0.826 using Naive Bayes

positions.subtitle: Gopali Youth Welfare Society
positions.description: • Managing a team of 45+ IITians from UG, PG divisions, and raised annual funds of INR 4.5+ million for India's largest student-run NGO• Educating 240+ underprivileged students free of cost in an English-Medium primary school of GYWS named Jagriti Vidya Mandir• Strategized CSR inflow into the organisation and Strengthened relations with Alumni, Corporates, CSR Partners, and individual donors• Outperformed the previous tenure as Executive Member with YoY increase of ~50% in total funds, and ~100% YoY increase in team strength
